document.full_text: ireland may have to ask for another loan from the european union and international monetary fund because it will struggle to return to debt markets to raise funds next year, a government minister said on sunday.
document.title: ireland may need more eu/imf cash: minister
lines_and_colors: ireland may have to ask for another loan from the european union and international monetary fund because it will struggle to return to debt markets to raise funds next year, a government minister said on sunday.
